content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cigarette with a friend, i went inside, then my friend hollered at me to come outside. this was the second time he had seen this happen in a week. the fiery looking orb was traveling slowly at first about 100 feet above the buildings heading southeast. i ran inside to get my phone and take a video, once i was recording it seemed to be moving faster. i was totally dumbstruck as i have never seen anything like this before, but i wasn't scared, just startled. i maintained sight of it until it traveled beyond the trees.
content.summary: Ball of fire approximately the size of a helicopter, morphed between orange, red, yellow.

content.detailedDescription: Observation d'un immense vaisseau mère circulant sur le fleuve st-laurent en direction de l'est... j'étais sur le quai de notre-dame du portage en train de pêcher. il faisait tempête mais j'ai clairement vu son ombre dans la pluie et les nuages... il était si gros qu'il semblait près et loin à la fois... j'ai attendu environ 1 1/2 mois avant d'en faire part car je cherchais une explication logique à tout ça... mais en vain...
content.summary: Observation d'un immense vaisseau mère circulant. sur le fleuve dans la brume en direction de l'est.

content.detailedDescription: 4am i heard a sound outside my bathroom window. i turn on my phone's night vision and see a bat like creature or entity hovering outside in the front tree. i thought i'm seeing things or it's reflection so i changed angles and zoomed in and the figure changed shapes. i took videos and pictures and just wanted my footage to do the talking as i find myself unable to describe what i witnessed. half way through i noticed helicopters and a small plane doing a circle around my block and big trucks going up and down my street like they were looking for something. there may be a logical explanation or there might not be. i just am at a loss for words.
content.summary: Human sized bat like hovering in tree

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling to my home in abbotsford, from coquitlam, b.C. it was very dark, about 2 am, no lights of any kind except the vehicle. i was alone coming from a dance after dropping off my date. a light suddenly caught my eye and i glanced to my left and flying parallel to me at same speed of 100kph, and about 1500 feet up was a white disc, with a large red spot on the underside center. at first i thought of instrument panel reflection, so i gave a quick turn off of my lights, but it was still there. i switched back on. that is when i became nervous, having heard of abductions. i accelerated up to 140kph, and it kept pace. same level. i wanted to stop and see what happened if i did. i thought of taking a photo of it. but decided i was safer in the car. where is a cop when you need one? after about 8 minutes it began to change. a blue ring appeared around the outside edge. the red remained lit. then it began to rise up slowly, a a 45 degree angle remaining flat.I watched as it slowly rose into the black sky and disappeared. i did not slow down all the way home. my daughter has told me she did see a black triangular one one night in vancouver b.C. it had a white light at the three corners. made no sound just glided overhead about 2000 feet above. she was not in a vehicle, but on foot.
content.summary: Very late at night while on highway home, almost no traffic, noticed this object to my left from my drivers window. it was running parallel to me.

content.detailedDescription:
I was with my friend the big slice pizza on queen st w downtown toronto at midnight when my friend noticed a very strange looking cloud form in front of the moon so with all the other activities i don't leave home without my nikon p900 which i pulled out and took a few pics and this is what i captured
the pic of anomaly over the apartment building i zoomed and filtered and it' looks an awful lot like something in a harry potter movie
and the other pic w discs is over lake ontario i would guess ,also looks like there are 3 discs 
and the cloud pic is just strange which is what attracted us to look
content.summary: Weird cloud formed so i took a pic and this is what showed

content.detailedDescription:
I was riding my motorcycle south on highway 57 when i noticed a red light hovering near the hydro towers there was also another car pulled over watching
the one picture is off my computer screen as i used my cell camera to act as a magnifying glass so i didn't distort the pic
content.summary: 5 ufo's hovering and flying near hydro towers

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of the moon and star, to add to my tattoos, i thought the moon and star were beautiful. i was later looking through the pictures i had taken with my cell phone of the moon and stars, and found that the one picture has two extra stars...But it wasnt visible to the naked eye. i could very clearly see the star and moon, and looked at it for several minutes. nothing ever flew by, no other stars were visible. not sure what's in my picture, or if its a camera glitch.
content.summary: Toom pictures of the moon and star, and something wierd showed up in my pictures that wasnt visible when taking a picture.

content.detailedDescription: There was a killing of a goat that left two legs with no blood left from the killing also a pit bull was skinned from inside out, only left the skin of the dog. the person living at the residence saw a four feet shadow near the dog house, he fired two shot near the shadow only saw foot prints of a single shadow with three toes .
content.summary: It was an alien on the ground eating an animal

content.detailedDescription: Was walking from car to house and looked up to see if there were any stars out. saw 3 cylindrical objects flying in a very tight formation. fast, low and silent. objects were wobbly with blurred edges. time was around 11:30 pm in near la - so there were a few stars around and plenty of ambient light. objects appeared to glow white. entire sighting was under 1 minute. objects flew by quickly from east to west then vanished. not planes, nor birds, nor drones. i got the feeling it was reconnaissance of some kind
content.summary: 3 cylindrical objects flying in a very tight formation. fast, low and silent. objects were wobbly with blurred edges.

content.detailedDescription:
I was inside my 2 story home (2nd floor), laying in bed, to my right is the window (window is centered in my room). my blinds were up just a foot or so. something outside was blinking red, caught my peripheral vision...Thought a helicopter was off in the distance), but as i was starring, immediately two things were off to me....There was absolutely no movement. not up, down, right or left, nor did it appear to be moving away. the thing is, even with that distance and window shut, i expected to hear the usual helicopter engine noise. 

that hovering really spooked me the most. i grabbed my camera phone in hopes to capture what i saw. 

most frustrating thing i learned, the object or light did not appear on camera as big as it appeared to me with the naked eye. also i was frustrated that zooming in causes lights to appear as they are moving as you physically adjust phone in an attempt to keep object on camera. other annyonmolly was when zooming in, lots of lights were being captured that i never saw with the naked eye. another problem, i reviewed it twice, there were additional lights i never saw while filming when gazing beyond my screen and most likely missed when not looking at my screen. in reviewing, i could tell and remember i was not zoomed in. yet (besides the stars i tried focusing on) i did not see those white flashing lights with the naked eye. i wasn't always watching my screen as i tried to look beyond for the original cause of my observation. yet, other unknowns were flashing through my screen when i was not moving or zoomed in. i only noiticed upon review. besides the neighbors lights to my far left, house lights in my trees from home across the valley on the other hillside, two stars i focused on, the original object in question......There were no other lights or blinking lights, or any zipping lights that appeared to my naked eye. i did noticed lots of lights on my screen when i zoomed in. i noticed none when i was fully zoomed out and was looking at my screen. i now know after review, there were a few. i'm not sure why there were so many lights filling my screen like that when i zoomed in. 

i lost sight of the original object after it slowly traveled (2nd appearance) to my right and my tall evergreens blocked my view. 

digital photos attached. they are showing my bedroom window with blindes up partially, which allowed me to see that light. photos with flash showing neighbors house to my left, showing horizon of tree tops where object and orb lights were seen hovering. tree line to my right where it eventually traveled and was no longer seen. photos to my right showing light in trees (that house on the hillside across my valley), the two stars right of the end of my immediate backyard tree line.
content.summary: Orting orbs or hovering craft, usual aircraft patterns and light activity

content.detailedDescription:
This sighting was very similar to the sighting that we had on oct.14, 2017.  (case 87346 )

my wife (kim) and i were sitting on our back deck, enjoying the evening.  at 7:17 pm, we noticed a very bright light as it appeared over the treetops.  the biggest difference between this sighting and our oct,14 sighting was the speed of the object - the oct.14 object was travelling very slowly (guess at less than 100mph), this object was travelling very quickly (guess at 250 to 350mph)  
it appeared from the nne, travelled almost directly overhead, and continued on a sse heading.  unlike the previous object, this one did not make a course change.  
similar to the previous sighting, as the object reached an estimated distance of 8 to 10 miles, the "bright light" seemed to be extinguished, leaving a small (much dimmer) red hazy light, that faded into the distance.

at no point were we able to discern any physical characteristics of the object.  there were no aircraft indicator lights, nor were there any strobes visible at any time.  also, there was no sound whatsoever.

both kim and i were viewing through good 10x50 binoculars.
content.summary: Very bright light travelling very quickly from nne to sse.

content.detailedDescription: On the night of october 15, 2017 at roughly 8:35pm cst my girlfriend and i were driving down fruit road in between edwardsville and hamel illinois in madison county, 30 minutes outside of st louis. we noticed one larger than star sized light in the sky glowing orange and witnessed it remaining motionless in the night sky for roughly 15 minutes before we pulled over on a frontage road that parallels interstate 55. the objects where roughly north/north east of or position when we stopped the car. once parked a second object, appeared in the sky that looked similar but may or may not have been associated with this phenomenon. we began to photograph and film the anomalous floating object in the sky and shortly after recording the original object began to move, at first in an eastward direction and then south east towards our vehicle until it flew directly over head. at this point we witnessed but did not record the previously homogeneous orange glow reveal itself to be a constant orange glow followed by a series of successive lights that flashed in an ordered pattern, appearing to be on the same craft. over the course of the next 3 hours multiple orange glowing objects appeared from the same point on the horizon only follow a similar pattern of hovering then flying in various directions but not necessarily in the same direction as the ones before it. over all 4-5 craft were observed.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Multiple times, bright, orange, larger than star sized objects hovering over 30 minutes and leaving in view

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my house around 9 and my road goes east to west. so i was driving and looked south, as i often watch the stars while driving. i noticed a bright orange-yellow light that resembled a star or planet. i was surprised as i never see a star that bright in the south. i stopped my car and watched it. as i watched it, it faded out and then reappeared right next to the original location. it faded again and reappeared next to that location. then did it once more. on the final reappear, it faded out and didn't return. i've seen this happen twice before now in the same area and direction.
content.summary: Orange ball in the sky that disappeared and then another reappeared next to it and so on. this happened 4 times until the final ball faded out like the rest of them

content.detailedDescription: It's from mars rover.This image was taken by mastcam: right (mast_right) onboard nasa's mars rover curiosity on sol 1845 (2017-10-14 22:00:43 utc).
content.summary: Pictures from nasa rover.

content.detailedDescription: After watching the documentary "ten eleven 0 two" me and a couple buddy's were very intrigued and interested to say the least mostly because it happened so close to home. last year we went out ther during the as i had asked "ken" the location of his encounter. of course nothn happened but it was neat just to be in the area. after sharing with an old friend of mine bout the film and location i suggested we go camping then drive out to the location at night. immediately he was like "hell yea i'll go!" all together there were only 3 of us that ended up goin. we campedout  a place we'd been to many times "sawmill flat". got ther friday...Set up camp then drove up to courtright reservoir for a lil hike and fishn during the day. next day on sat we decided let's just hang out and relax all day. later on that afternoon we asked ourselves "are we gona go tonite or not?" of course we decided might as well... it's why we came up. after an early dinner we loaded up in my boys hummer nd took the cruise up. got to the off road trail bout 6pm....Took us an hr to get thru the 3mile trek. when we got to the campsite on the eastern edge of the lake we got off and walked down to the lake beach area. by this time it was pretty dark. for the first 30mins or so we just gazed at the stars...It was a clear no moon night. my buddy rob said it best "like diamonds in the sky". i could sense we were bout to leave so i turned to gaze up at the north star area as it was lit like a candle when all of us sudden out of no where i notice this light appear. the other two didn't notice and i didn't say anything for the first 5-7 or so seconds. after i ruled "ok that thing has no blinking lights or any type of motor noise" i tell my buddy's "hey check out this light that appeared heading our way!" for the nxt 10 seconds we all stared at it again ruling out possible plane or any normal obvious flying object we're all used to seeing on the daily. i could swear i witness it wiggle side to side but my boy says "that's yur eyes playing tricks" so i look away for a second or two to refocus then look back up. by this time my boy pulls out his phone and started recording it. again after a few seconds i kno for a fact i saw it wiggle again side to side. one of my boy's you can tell immediately got shooken up as he asked to leave 3 different times. we watched this thing fly directly over us from west to east. as it crossed over it we watched go until it was nearing the tree nd high peak behind is and then poof it simply disappeared!! i am convinced 100% it wasn't a normal craft. i won't mention one of my friends name as he works for an orginization i'd rather not say but i will say this. he's an aircraft mechanic and now an investigator of plane crashes. if anyone can officially rule out what we saw as an aircraft it would be him...A professional at hand. we went ther hoping to see something maybe just out of excitement but honestly didn't think we would. we got something waaay more than we bargained for and something we'll never forget. probably not the best idea but we're already talking about goin up again for the night in a few weeks.
content.summary: While star gazing i noticed a light appear out of no where and watched it fly over us til it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: My wife, a friend and i witnessed a starlike orb appear from the west overhead oht of no where, no sound, no blinking lights, and traveled high speed directly overhead, i jumped up with phone, everyone watching, and it changed path to south east at high rate,
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Orb appeared starlike overhead at 60degrees, flew over head at 90deg, hovered, then turned se over tree

content.detailedDescription: Home back porch smoking a cigarette with my wife,as she had seen it as well,a moving star what no way then pointed it out to wife,a satellite maybe,but at 17,500 mph it would move rather quick but sum were slow and hovering almost a stillness it was like the were just cruising around anxious,excited,cant see with me eyeballs
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 6 different objects from 6 diffident directions

content.detailedDescription:
I recently saw a ufo near my house several months ago. since then, i keep my eyes in the sky...Especially like days today. it was perfectly clear and you could see airplanes from hundreds of miles away. not a cloud in the sky. i took a stroll to the backyard to see what work needed to be done. i looked into the south skies. while doing so, i took notice to a bright metallic object in the southern skies.  it stood out becuase it far brighter and lacked the "trail" all the other planes were leaving in the sky. it didn't look like it was moving at all initially. shortly after, it sped up acsending and descending throughout it's flight path. over the course of about 7 seconds it moved all the way from the southern sky to a position between me and sun, where it seemed to disappear. i couldn't really see at this point due to the brightness of the sun, so i just started filming and covered my eyes with my other arm. i could faintly see it appear just above the horizon where it asends a short distance then descends below the horizon(right before i say "ufo" in the video). i kept the filming rolling another 10 seconds or so for the heck of it. after reviewing the footage a bright light was present (which was not there after revewing the footage, 20 or 30 secs went by). i assume this is an effect of filming the sun? in addition, the video has some objects flying by. not sure what to think of this either, it wasn't really windy at all? maybe a 3-4 mph wind speed?  i was hoping to have someone who knows a thing or two about video software to analyze it to get a better picture. hoping maybe someone else saw this or coulud derive an explanation from the video. please email me regarding investigation. hope this helps. 

thanks
content.summary: I saw an object fly from the south towards the sun in the distance. i began to film and saw it appear, ascend, descend, then head north.

content.detailedDescription: Several of these “helicopters” started this low flying pattern back and forth above the airport. then continued about 5 miles west because my boss saw them too at his house. still just above trees
content.summary: Stealthy objects that seemed to closely resemble helicopters flying low but made no sound

content.detailedDescription: While traveling southbound on hwy. 55 at approx. 6:20am i notice a strobe light at a high altitude to the east. it was an extremely fast pulse then stopped for a second and repeated. not like a normal plane strobe. it moved south at a very high rate of speed, an was beyond the southern horizon in under 2 minutes. there was a plane at the same time to the south east, traveling south. the planes speed was much slower in comparison an took several minutes to travel out of sight. i saw no outline an it was not visible in between pulses.
content.summary: White strobe very fast and intermittent.  high air speed

content.detailedDescription: I work at the california correctional institution in tehachapi california.During my commute home to bakersfield i observed a cigar shape object hover over the canyon on hwy 58.It had bright blue led lights which are now common place but that color at the time was not something i had ever witnessed. it hovered with 4 to 6 lights flying low and flue into the side of the north facing mountain and just vaporized into thin air.I was driving west bound on hwy 58 it flue from left to right in my field of view.It seemed as if it created water vapor or a cloud when it dematerialized. it has changed my life in regards to having an open mind about ufo's.No body in my family took me serious.The following day at work i overheard some co workers describe the same experience i had.No way could i have taken a video or picture i was too awestruck to do anything other then stare at it. so sorry i didn't record it with my cell phone.I was shaking the whole way home.
content.summary: Ufo event over highway 58 .On my way home from work.Witnessed by other co workers as well.

content.detailedDescription: I and some friends were playing in my grandfather's front yard between 10 - 11pm at night when we saw two dark triangular objects hovering in the sky above us. they were still, hovering in the same place with no noise. the lights were solid, and would sometimes grow brighter or pulsate. sometimes the lights would flash. the lights appeared white, and also orange/red. we began to point at them and run around on the ground below them. when they lit up it frightened us enough to go and wake my grandfather up to look at them. as we ran to the house the objects went from stationary to exceptional speed in an instant. shooting from where they had been hovering towards frankfort where they disappeared. they did not appear to change altitude, only fly away at an incredible rate of speed. they were gone in an instant. i do  not remember any associated noise. we did wake my grandfather up, but by then they were gone.
content.summary: Two triangular objects with lights hovered, then shot away.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking our dog for a walk on sennawood dr to fabick lane in fenton, missouri when at approximately 10:00-10:15pm my dog started barking. i looked up and witnessed a large, dark craft which was long like a cylinder over the treeline with 3-4 emerald to pine green iridescent but non-flashing lights underneath moving from what i believe is the south west to the north east of where i was standing. it appeared to be under a mile away and i witnessed a faint, almost non noticeable beam protruding from the back of the craft but not illuminating the trees, i could see a shadow from the craft on the tree tops but no light hitting them. i did not hear any sound coming from it and my phone shut off and restarted on its own. the object appeared to be moving at about 20-30 mph until it stopped in the distance, then i lost view of it.
content.summary: Long, dark, cylinder or cigar shaped craft in the distance with 3-4 observed green lights underneath

content.detailedDescription:
I had trouble sleeping one evening so decided to go for a walk. it was about 04:00 on the 14th of october in 2015 in harlow, uk. it was a clear night so i was looking at the stars a lot. as i changed direction my attention came to a different part of the sky where i noticed the object. it was a cigar shaped orange light that was stationary. the light had no blinking lights that aircraft would normally have, but was just a orange light with what appeared to be diagonal lines going through the light. it also appeared to be a dark shape around the light almost squarish. i thought the light was strange so sat and watched it for a few minutes to see if it was moving. it was not. i also noticed there was no noise coming from the object which was also strange as aircraft overhead normally make a noise. after it hadn’t changed direction or moved i decided to take a picture of the object. my first photo was faded as o had the flash on so i had time to change the camera settings which was all new to me and took about a minute to figure out and take another picture. this picture had clearly caught the object as well as some stars. i was then checking out the photo to make sure it was a good picture and just shortly after the object just disappeared. i physically saw this object with my own eyes for several minutes before capturing it on camera. i can’t explain what i saw that night it didn’t look like anything i have seen in the sky before or aircraft so to me it is a ufo. i would be keen to find out if anyone else has seen anything else like this or can explain it.

people have said its lens flare but that does not explain how or why i saw it with my own eyes. when you zoom in on the picture you can see a shape around the light it would be interesting to see if someone can make this object clearer.
content.summary: Stationary light seen with eye that disappeared after 10 mins

content.detailedDescription: Manifested right above the corn the size of a full moon moving slowly right above the corn.  began elevating to height of light pole. once at that height it began moving like a falling sheet of paper changing direction. it would pause and pulsate. i noticed a dark orb inside of the glowing orb that the light would shrink to then grow again.  then fall again like paper with no sound. it then pulsated and was maybe 8 ft from the ground and lifted up and pulsated while making a landing drop and disappeared.If it means anything it manifested as if it heard a conversation that i was having with a fellow witness about right triangle formations that i noticed the brightest stars form then it appears
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Manifested right above the corn the size of a full moon moving slowly right above the corn.  began elevating to height of light pole. once at that height it began moving like a falling sheet of paper changing direction and speed without sound displaying a

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the apartment complex pool area in my bathing suit between 3 and 4pm in my bathing suit. mind you, i have never reporting seeing any object in the sky and feel very hesitant to do this. i have asked a few friends and i don't think it's a drone.

i was on the lounge chair and to my right i noticed something flying over head in the sky. this is houston and it is hot enough to be at the pool and swim.I don't know why i noticed as i had sun glasses on and wanted to nap.
i can include a photo of the area later of where i saw this.

i got up off the lounge chair and there was solid black, ring shaped object propelling itself over three line and over the apartment buildings, now mind you they are two stories but this object is well above two stories. it was a sunny hot day. the object was crooked and going pretty fast. it was not a balloon as these don't fly or look like circles. a drone spins and this was not spinning. it cleared a short amount of space and vanished into the clouds. it could be easy to say that it was a product of johnson space center, i have no idea why it would be flying around up here. you could say it was a toy. i don't know if flying toys go that high and i didn't see anyone nearby with a remote control. all i can say a boy at the pool who is under age saw it too. i had him look with me as he was the only nearby with his grandmother. he had no idea either. i have never seen anything like it and i do not take drugs and of sound mind.
content.summary: Found flying over apartment complex pool area. black hazy solid object. doughnut shaped that flew a short distance then disappeared into the clouds.Made no noise. it was a circle shaped object above tree and apartment building line.

content.detailedDescription: I was right outside in our backyard and we saw a flying object for about 5-8 seconds. i had seen a ufo beforehand on a friends snapchat story of it flying back and forth in a u pattern seemingly for it to take off. i tried sending it to him so i could save it somehow but when i tried to it said this snapchat has expired literally within a few minutes of it being posted. i got to see it flying and it had circular red lights on the bottom. i also screenshotted it because i was sure air traffick control would have sighted the intense speeds making the nsa delete the content from my friends phone literally within minutes. i observed the screenshot closer and not only was it circular but it also had a triangular shape around it. i asked my friends if they were on any mind altering substances because the brain has an electrical current that can likely be noticed by extraterrestrials (they had "just smoked weed" which made sense to me because it makes the brain stimulated to be much more active etc.) this also reminds me of my ex girlfriend because she was on lsd when she saw a ufo and although coorelation is not causation the close encounters of the fifth kind or spiritual contact could likely be influenced by mind altering substances due that it affects the spiritual area of the brain. much love and i wasn't sure if i should post this because of the sensitivity of this subject although i might aswell because i have interesting information i would say so myself. (i felt like the craft had multiple shapes for it's interstellar nature) i am glad dr. greer had educated me on some of these issues beforehand :) also "agree to hold mufon harmless for any injury or harm resulting or arising from any use by mufon of said media." that's why i wasn't sure if i should considering how the secrets are hidden in plain sight and so secrets are not secrets when people know them but that's also why i used a fake name which is fair enough.
content.summary: My brother and i saw a comet like craft although it didn't seem to have the trails of a comet and it looked quite different the way it acted.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my balcony taking pictures of the blood moon with my canon 7dii, 100-400mmlii with tripod. i saw a bright star to the bottom right of the moon and was using it to be in the photo composition. i then notice it started flickering and it changed from white to blue. i then directed my camera to it and at first it had white swirls on the blue then it had changed to a face. i posted the images on facebook and the photo of the face was pixeliized. i reposted it then it was scrambled again. i tried to find the pictures on my hard drive and they are now missing. luckily i had downloaded them to my phone. the pictures are in order.
content.summary: Was taking look moon photos and saw star change colors and pattern.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my deck which looks out at delmonte forest, the monterey coast line and pacific ocean. it was roughly 3:40 pm, i was just standing looking out at the trees and the ocean,i have very sceenic view. all of a sudden saw this object out over pacific ocean, at 40 degree angle on horizon,flying straight line path at very high speed it looked to be cylinder shaped, pulsating, light blue white in color almost transparent, like it was trying to blend in with skyline very stealth like. it was running north to south to pacific coast line i saw it for about 5 to 8 seconds, then it was out of view. this was no jet,!! or missle . i never seen anything like it. i like to know if anyone else saw it that day?
content.summary: Saw cylinder object light blue almost transparent very stealth like craft moving at a very high rate of speed off coast line of monterey ca heading south

content.detailedDescription: Came outside for a smoke facing west on a clear sunny day with a few clouds at 11:27 am on 10/16/17. we have a lot of air traffic in the tampa bay area. i noticed a dark rectangular object at 33 degrees to the nw over a mile away. i thought it was a bird gliding at first. dark with no reflection from sun. sun was still in the east and object was west so it should have been bright if it were a plane. we are subject to military aircraft such as black hawk helo's. object appeared a thin rectangular object and moved south in front of clouds for several seconds. in less than a mile and aprox. 100 mph it just vanished. no cloud cover when this happened. i tracked it's known path for a while to see if it would reemerge. it did not. then i noticed my eyes were full of spots every time i blinked. similar to a photo flash but in a 20 x 20 grid of dots. this is not unusual looking up in the sky in florida but not when looking away from the sun and not in a grid pattern. not sure what i saw due to it's distance. i know i was fully awake and conscious and saw this event clearly. the object would have been over the gulf of mexico at least a mile out.
content.summary: Observed dark rectangular object moving right to left in front of clouds. vanished. left vision with spots in eyes similar to camera flash.
